attributes.action: protect parliamentary transparency and the public's right to see details of MPs expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
by voting against the draft Freedom of Information (Parliament) Order 2009 on Thursday 22 January 2009,

and sign Jo Swinson’s Early Day Motion number 492

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
